page.title: 05Transport
page.content: {Road system Dorchester is a major gateway to the South West and to Weymouth, a port and seaside resort. It is also on the East to West route along the coast which is linked with roads to London. {Bus routes} There are twelve bus routes passing through Dorchester connecting Weymouth and many rural areas with the market town and with each other.Also there are coach and bus services from here to London and other places. {Trains} Dorchester is on two important lines linking with the rest of the country via Bristol and Bournemouth. Both routes link to the line which connects to Weymouth; taking tourists in Summer and cargo throughout the year to and from the Channel Islands and France.
